fields.comment: Numerator for decay rate in score formula. Set to 0 for no decay, 1 otherwise. Score formula is base_score * exp( -(vote_age*DECAY_NUM/DECAY_DENOM)^(2*EXPONENT) ).
Denominator for decay rate in score formula. Must be nonzero. Set to higher value to delay the score decay. Score formula is base_score * exp( -(vote_age*DECAY_NUM/DECAY_DENOM)^(2*EXPONENT) ).
Exponent for score formula. Set to higher value for a steeper decay around the cutoff. Score formula is base_score * exp( -(vote_age*DECAY_NUM/DECAY_DENOM)^(2*EXPONENT) ).
Number of score decimals to display. Use 0 for integers.
